LG Viewty users must send the jar files via bluetooth,  The standard LG suite will not allow you to transfer .jar file via USB - and not all the games will work with the handset!
put the jar file into the map ¨other¨ on your phone when its linked to the computer. Then you go inside the phone and go to ¨other¨ and then just install it :)

nope, kobby.
the easiest way of putting stuff on your viewty is by getting a micro sd memory card and using it.
connect your viewty (using mass storage option)  to yur pc and copy and paste the file on yur memory card.then on yur viewty go to others and install the game.bdw, the extension has to be - .jar
